inclusion.criterion: Upper limb muscle tone assessed by Modified Ashworth Scale ≤ 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability of the participant to sit independently without external support.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Additional neurological or musculoskeletal problems (such as Parkinson's disease, unilateral neglect, Pusher syndrome and apraxia).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Severe vision or sensory deficits affecting upper limb movements.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Aphasia affecting understanding of simple instructions.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, but no other exclusion criteria mentioned.
